thread.title: MIC's Georgia Toffolo wears plunging mini dress in London | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: MIC's Georgia Toffolo wears plunging mini dress in London | Daily Mail Online

author: Lisa Mcloughlin For Mailonline
title: MIC's Georgia Toffolo wears plunging mini dress in London | Daily Mail Online
text: Neighbour from hell! Ayda Field talks about her next door nemesis Relationships aside, singer Tallia Storm flexed her fashion muscle as she slipped into her black mini dress with head-turning tiger print exaggerated sleeves and matching mini bag. The 18-year-old Scottish star's look featured a military edge with it's gold naval buttons , which she choose to offset with a pair of statement earrings. Parading her pins, she added inches to her petite frame with her elaborate heeled sandalas that wrapped around her slender calves. Wrapped up: Bip Ling showcased her toned stomach in a netted multi-coloured top alongside music starlet Tallia Print pals: Bip Ling, presenters Becca Dudley and Kat Shoob sported a number of prints for the occasion Perky: Singer Hatty Keane's racy ensemble highlighted her pert posterior in the oil slicked dress Skintight: The music star slipped into a figure-flaunting PVC dress that accentuated her hourglass curves Meanwhile, reality star Olivia Buckland took the red carpet by storm in her leather mini skirt that hugged her peachy derriere as she made her way inside the venue, showcasing her many intricate inkings. The 22-year-old teamed her leg lengthening number with a paint-splattered chic blouse as she strutted her stuff in her perspex heeled mules that coordinated with her patent leather bag. A number of other famous faces appeared on the carpet including presenter Vogue Williams, TOWIE's Jessica Wright and former X Factor judge Nick Grimshaw. Here come the boys: Radio 1's Nick Grimshaw, Troy and singer Jonas Blue gave the women's eclectic style a run for their money (Pictured l-r) Making a splash: MIC star Fran Newman-Young and presenter Olivia Cox made a splash on the red carpet Read more:
